scripts.create-event: node v1/node_modules/pcdm-store-updater/kinesify-data.js --profile nypl-digital-dev --envfile v1/config/local-qa.env --ids 12078522 --nyplType bib events/decoded/event1.json events/encoded/12078522.json
scripts.send-events-v1: cd v1; for file in ../events/encoded/*.json; do aws lambda invoke --function-name "DiscoveryHybridIndexer" --endpoint-url "http://127.0.0.1:3001" --payload file://$file out.txt --cli-binary-format raw-in-base64-out; done
scripts.send-events-v2: cd v2; for file in ../events/encoded/*.json; do aws lambda invoke --function-name "DiscoveryHybridIndexer" --endpoint-url "http://127.0.0.1:3001" --payload file://$file out.txt --cli-binary-format raw-in-base64-out; done
scripts.start-lambda-v1: cd v1; sam local start-lambda -t sam.test.yml
scripts.start-lambda-v2: cd v2; sam local start-lambda -t sam.test.yml
